properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 4:01AM EST until January 8 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...QUICK MOVING STORM SYSTEM TO BRING GALES TO COASTAL WATERS
THIS AFTERNOON AND TONIGHT...

.Winds will increase quickly late this morning and afternoon with
Gale Force conditions expected by mid afternoon. SW winds around
25 to 35 knots are expected, with higher gusts ahead of the cold
front, and then will turn to the west-northwest behind the front
early Tuesday night. Seas will build to as high as 6 to 9 feet by
late this evening. Conditions gradually improve Wednesday.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt,
becoming west this evening, and seas 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to 2 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM EST WEDNESDAY
